data.name: Reimei no Gakuen Digital Artbook
data.detailed_description:
This is the Official Artbook of the visual novel, Reimei no Gakuen.
Get to know your favorite characters even more! If you wish to know more backstories, special powers, or other interesting and funny things, you'll surely enjoy this.

The artbook features 130 pages, containing high-definition artwork, character profiles, and trivia.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Reimei no Gakuen Digital Artbook. 130 pages of artwork, character profiles, and trivia.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720
  • Storage: 900 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.5 or higher
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720
  • Storage: 900 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
Adult content includes a few illustrations of characters kissing.
There are also a few illustrations and scenes that show mild violence, blood, and death.
